divs: Sighting DetailsWitness observed the oval shape light just above the trees outside of her and her mothers house. She watched it for a few seconds and then yelled for her mother to look. Just after the mother observed the same light it vanished. This was just about 2 weeks prior to her sons sighting on 5-12-2009. Witness has also had other sightings: She had a sighting with her son about the year 1998. They observed a bight light over a mobil home about a telephone pole long. It took off to the south at a high speed. The witness also observed a triagular craft just above the trees above her house. This sighting happened around (2008), 6 months prior to the current sighting. It had white lights on each corner and a red light in the middle.
Summary: Bright light, oval shape, silver lining, about 6 to 7 ft. long
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Portsmouth
There were no other sightings in Portsmouth on or around March 31st 2009
